review: Lamisil (terbinafine):I was prescribed Lamisil to use for 2 weeks to treat mild jock itch. after the first week, the symptoms got much worse (swelling, burning, itching and spreading) the second week I started loosing my taste and smell and the symptoms did not improve at all. Started using another broad spectrum antifungal cream and the Jock itch was completely destroyed within 3 days. I will not recommend Lamisil to anyone!
I take terbinafine 500mg one pill per day. My course period is 6 to 8 week. But I end my course within 6 week. Works well with cream
Iâ€™m taking Terbinafine and just today I took my first pill...please wish me luck!

I had terrible terrible terrible rash and itch, it had spread in large area. I had used itch guard coconut oil, Vit E oil but nothing worked. Then  I bought one tube of terbinafine cream and it has worked wonders on the jock itch I almost suffered for 1 month with this rash and I got rid of all those in just 3 days, will keep on using if for a while though. It did nothing to the scars but my itching completely vanished  and it made my skin smooth within 1week.. it is amazing
